      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      The UserProvider Togglz should use to obtain the current user.

    • Uses of UserProvider in org.togglz.core.user

      Classes in org.togglz.core.user that implement UserProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NoOpUserProvider
      This implementation of UserProvider can be used if user-dependent feature toggling isn't used at all.
      class  SingleUserProvider
      A very simple implementation of UserProvider which always returns the supplied user.

    • Uses of UserProvider in org.togglz.core.user.jaas

      Classes in org.togglz.core.user.jaas that implement UserProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JAASUserProvider
      This implementation supports looking up the current user the JAAS AccessControlContext.

    • Uses of UserProvider in org.togglz.core.user.thread

      Classes in org.togglz.core.user.thread that implement UserProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ThreadLocalUserProvider
      This implementation of UserProvider is very useful if authentication has been implemented using a servlet filter.

    • Uses of UserProvider in org.togglz.servlet.user

      Classes in org.togglz.servlet.user that implement UserProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ServletUserProvider
      Implementation of UserProvider that uses HttpServletRequest.getUserPrincipal() to obtain the user.
